source_description: Recover Feature 008 dossier contract implementation (commits 5237894 + 139ca09) from git reflog onto a branch from origin/2.x, merge upstream security statement commit (640709f), run full conformance + fixture replay tests, push to origin/2.x, and publish release tag v2.4.0. Makes four dossier/parity event contracts available to runtime and SaaS consumers without re-implementation.
